info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The Assessment calculates Cronbach's Alpha, reliability values, for items (columns) in a gradebook. The component also appends summary information, namely, the average and standard deviation for each item as well as it's correlation to the total score.
info.options: Summary column present - flag indicating if last column is a summary column
